automatic_ordering.reasoning: Reviewing the two sessions, AD_FoundKey involves the party discovering an item (despite the word 'mold', the session name suggests it is a key-like object) that is used at a forge. CINE_HammerStrike shows a party member activating a lever at the Adamantine Forge, which—given the context—appears as a follow‐up event that is enabled when the forge is operative. In narrative terms it makes sense for the party to first find the object in AD_FoundKey before triggering mechanisms in CINE_HammerStrike. There is no indication that these two sessions are mutually exclusive; rather, they appear to be sequential parts of the same storyline.
